Abbas saves Chanda, but the unit kills both of them at Babloo's behest. Vedha realizes that the entire unit has been bribed by Babloo.
Vikram and Vedha are both police officers, but Vedha becomes a fugitive after a feud with Pandey. Vikram shoots bullets in frustration as Vedha escapes again due to corruption within the unit.
Babloo bribes Abbas to kill Chanda, but Abbas realizes the error of his ways and tries to save her instead. This leads to their deaths at the hands of Babloo's other associates.
Babloo bribes the entire police unit to kill Vedha and Chanda. The Unit carries out Babloo's orders, but Abbas's attempt to save Chanda leads to their deaths.
Vedha's men are being targeted and eliminated by The Unit. During one such chase, Sanki pushes Vedha out of their vehicle, only to be intercepted by Abbas, who turns out to be on Babloo's payroll.

Vikram realizes that The Unit has also been bribed by Babloo. The IG reveals that Babloo paid them to kill Vedha and Chanda's abduction was intended to lure Shatak out of Mumbai, which would lure Vedha out of hiding.
